headline: Qualcomm (QCOM) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of wireless chipmaker Qualcomm (NASDAQ:QCOM) fell 3.4% in the afternoon session after Mizuho Securities downgraded the company to Neutral from Outperform, citing challenges in the handset business.

raw.headline: Qualcomm (QCOM) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why

headline: TSMC’s Revenue Outlook ‘May Disappoint,’ Says Analyst. There’s a Silver Lining.
summary: The company, which dominates the market for manufacturing high-end chips, is scheduled to report its earnings on Thursday.

headline: 5 U.S. chip stocks to buy in 2026: Bernstein
summary: Investing.com -- Bernstein has reiterated its bullish stance on several major U.S. semiconductor names in 2026, arguing that the sector remains supported by strong AI spending trends and rising prospects for wafer-fab equipment demand.

headline: Volkswagen-Qualcomm Deal Strengthens SDV and Autonomous Push
summary: VWAGY teams up with Qualcomm to power SDVs, enabling Level 4 driving, zonal architecture and AI infotainment by 2027.
